title: Knights (1993) DvDRip
description:
Knights is a B-grade post-apocalypse movie staring kick-boxing champion 

Kathy Long in her film debut. Kathy plays rescued protege to Kris Pros: 

Kris Kristofferson in an unusual role. Martial artist Kathy Long not as 

bad as might have been expected. Some supporting cast shine in spots.

Cons: Lance Hendrickson phoned it in. His character and role are silly. 

Thank goodness he has minions to do most of the action.

Kristofferson is in one of his more unusual roles as a cyborg-killer 

cyborg. Lance Hendrickson, better known for his portayal of artificial 

person Bishop in the Alien series plays evil cyborg leader Job, who leads 

his band of Cyborgs across the wasteland harvesting and consuming human 

blood for fuel.

Knights was originally intended by director Albert Pyun as a sequel to his 

1989 movie Cyborg, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, but eventually became 

and stand-alone feature.

Though the plot and acting are weak, Kristofferson's natural screen 

presence holds the movie together. There are moments when you could close 

your eyes and see him as Whistler of the later Blade movie series. Long 

actually pulls off some shining moments and her character seems at least 

as credible as many modern female action roles. Most of the main 

character's fight scenes are well done and Long's genuine fighting skills 

impress as she barrels through man and machine alike in the climactic 

conflict. Overall it is fun to watch without being impressive in any way.  

The strange open-ended finish reveals the fact that sequels were planned 

before the movie failed financially.

This is the only copy I could find. It is a rather low-quality rip, and 

has verbal translation over the default audio track. Be sure to change 

your veiwer to the second choice audio track.
